message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it.  I'm asking for $120 for it, but I'm open to discussing a fair price.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I believe I can find something similar elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get closer to my asking price.  How about $110?  That would still be a good deal for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $105 for the product.
